newsitem.title: USA: More than 98 pct Cheyenne Software tendered.
newsitem.headline: More than 98 pct Cheyenne Software tendered.

text.p: Computer Associates International Inc said Monday that more than 98 percent of Cheyenne Software Inc common stock was tendered.

The tender for all of the outstanding shares at $30.50 cash per share expired Friday. About 37.75 million shares representing nearly 100 percent of Cheyenne outstanding common were tendered, Computer Associates said.
The company said its merger with Cheyenne would happen no earlier than November 30.
Computer Associates, which makes business software, had said on October 7 that it would buy Cheyenne for $30.50 a share in a deal valued at $1.2 billion.
Cheyenne makes storage management, anti-virus and communications software.
